name: Kostfonden
goal: Kostfonden (the Diet and Nutrition Foundation; www.kostfonden.se) is a Swedish not-for-profit organisation that raises money to fund scientific studies examining dietary effects on health and the possible side effects a change of diet can provide. Kostfonden funds large and high-quality studies that can form the basis for new national treatment guidelines.
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020 ‘Science with and for Society’ Work Programme 2018-2020
